name: Wasted in Welkin Way
description:
This is a spec script I made in Fungus of Night School Studio's game Afterparty. I also wrote out a linear version of the script and the many different interactions in WriterDuet that can be downloaded as a PDF.

 IP, characters of Milo, Lola, Wormhorn, elevator demons, Terry + Jerry and doorman are owned by Night School Studio.

Shady Guy in Line character written by me.

I did this so I could try and improve my Unity skills by mimicking Night School Studio's dialogue/interruption system in Fungus. I think I implemented that part well.

Takes place about an hour into the game after Sam drops off Lola and Milo at the party. 

Credits:

  • Font: DK Lemon Yellow Sun
  • Milo character sprite: Taken from here
  • Lola character sprite: Taken from here
  • Wormhorn character sprite: Taken from here
